import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import "../assets/css/Product.css"; import useBreadcrumbs from "use-react-router-breadcrumbs"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Product() { const breadcrumbs = useBreadcrumbs(); return (
{breadcrumbs.map(({ breadcrumb, match }, index) => ( {breadcrumb}{" "} {index === breadcrumbs.length - 1 ? ( "" ) : ( )} ))}
